channel.title: deep learning on Ankit
channel.description: Recent content in deep learning on Ankit

item.title: What Einstein? What Einsum?
item.description: Einstein summation lets us write an algebric expression in index-notation and have numpy/pytorch/jax generate the most effiecient set of tensor operations to compute it. The only cons is that it can be confusing and comes with a learning curve. Einsum is backend agnostic tho, i.
